titleStmt.title: A True and exact relation of the araignment, tryal, and condemnation of Tho. Tongue, George Philips, James Hind, Francis Stubbs, John Sallows, Nathaniel Gibbs, for high treason, at the Sessions-Hovse in the Old-Baily on Thurday the 11th, of December 1662 being a full discovery of the whole plot.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
